website_summaries.verdict: Easy to set up, this grow tent has durable stitching and a few pinholes to maximize your light.
pros: Rectangular vents with mesh for ventilation
Multiple vents for fan and filter output
Heavy-duty zippers and double stitching for leak protection

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tent
customer_reviews.text: Took about 20min to assemble and most importantly, NO LIGHT LEAKS. Finally found a tent where I didn't have to damn near rip it apart trying to pull it over the frame. The only reason for not giving 5 stars was the corners are plastic and I cracked 1 inserting the pole. Not bad enough to weaken the frame but cracked still the same. Other than that, PERFECT. Update Changed my rating to 5 stars because topoLite read my review and promptly sent me 2 new corner connectors without me asking.... awesome customer service.... Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: This is a updated review. I recently bought the 2x2x4 tent and had some issues with the zipper. I left a review explaining what happened. Hours later I was contacted by customer service. They went out of there way to help me and make things right. Long story short, I am extremely happy with my purchase. Customer service is on another level. Awesome people!! If your looking for a good well built, affordable tent then look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Stealthgrows

customer_reviews.title: Budget Friendly
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a perfect budget friendly grow tent this is the one for you! This bad boy has been amazing! This tent is perfect for Autos because they stay short and bush out. I wouldn’t recommend if you’re going to grow photos in here just because it’s a little small and you will be able to fit one photo. But, if you grow autos you would be able to put about (4) 3Gallon pots in here. However, the material is perfect, it’s perfect for a closet grow I currently have this in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Royalty

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I ordered this for indoor growing
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I ordered this for indoor growing. It arrived as promised. I opened the package and misplaced one of the key parts. I contacted the manufacturer for a replacement part. Within 2 hours I received a response with a tracking number for delivery! I call that great customer service! As far as the product goes, the quality is excellent. The cover is made of heavy material that will last forever. The support frame goes together easily and is sturdy. No issues hanging a light from the frame. There are multiple vents for fans and cabling. The vents have drawstrings to ensure a good seal. Overall I'm really impressed with thus product. I would highly recommend this product !
customer_reviews.author: Summitgeorge

customer_reviews.title: Great grow tent no light leaks, snug fit of tent on frame.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tent, I am a first timer with feminized auto flower seeds from I.L.G.M. the reason only four stars on assembly is because it was a bit tough to get it to fit but just some wiggling and it zipped no rips no light leakage except the pinholes my cats have put in sides climbing to lay on top, yes it has plastic corner pieces instead of metal but SO many vent openings. I only wish I'd have controlled the growth height better because my plane is too tall for the horizon 600 watt hanging light I got but by Christmas I should have my white widow flowers! comes with straps.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Got all my peppers started this spring with great success. Adjustable vents are well located and open/close ...
customer_reviews.text: Got all my peppers started this spring with great success. Adjustable vents are well located and open/close well, and the zipper is high quality. I hang my LED light from the cross member on top, and the height is perfect. Setup was quick and easy, and it's pretty sturdy. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MB 007

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic deal!
customer_reviews.text: I almost bought a more expensive vivosun 2x2x4 tent but saw this and decided to save some money. Glad I did! It’s just as good (I have a bigger vivosun) and it came with a whole bag of unexpected accessories! I don’t know what happened but I got shears, trellis netting, a thermometer/hygrometer, a plug in timer, and adjustable rope—all in addition to the tent which only set me back $50. I can’t speak to light leaks yet but those are easy to patch up. So far I haven’t noticed any. I highly recommend this tent and will definitely purchase from them again :)
customer_reviews.author: Nat B.

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipping and very easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping and very easy set up. This tent is really short, you may want to scrog in here. The zipper broke after one day of use. Very inexpensive, but you get what you pay for. I am returning this tent. I have some seedlings that will be sprouting in the next couple of days so I'm scrambling to get a new tent asap. I hope these seeds don't go to waste, they were petty expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, ridiculously low price.
customer_reviews.text: Quality overall is top notch. For $45, this is a damn good tent. I’ve had it up and running for a couple days and have zero complaints. Assembly is pretty easy. It’s holding 9lbs of equipment now. It’s good at it what it does, as in holding heat. That’s a human error on my part, but keep in mind it’ll cook if it needs to. Excellent tent. Especially for $45.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Sisneroz

customer_reviews.title: Too Cheap. I suggest vivosun instead.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. Very cheap. Not priced cheap enough. Tons of light leak due to making it as cheap as possible. Can't holes aren't sturdy at all. Corners as made of plastic and the poles don't fit right. For a budget tent we don't expect perfection, but it's an obviously stolen design, you might as well have used the whole design.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Tackett

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great little tent! I just wish I had bought one a little taller. Great quality and very easy to setup!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon T.

customer_reviews.title: Only one setting
customer_reviews.text: It's misleading that they call this "full spectrum" because there is only one setting - ON. If you want to veg it says to hold it closer to the light, if you want bloom then put the light further away. I wouldn't have bought it had I known, but I use this for veg only and another light for bloom. It seems to put out a decent amount of lumens so overall I'm content with it, I just wish I would have known there was only one setting.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent material, inside and out. Easily assembled with the included directions, in about 5-10 minutes. This is a solid tent and I couldn’t be happier with my purchase. I highly recommend this tent. I’ve had zero issues with it or the zipper. In fact, I’m in and out of this tent 5-6 times a day and the zipper functions flawlessly each and every time.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence D.

customer_reviews.title: No Light Leaks
customer_reviews.text: No light Leaks, good quality overall! Only the corners could be made out of another material rather than plastic, but plastic feels okay! If using an inline fan, be careful of not wind burning your plants since it;s a small tent high power inline fans could give you some problems, my plants got wind burned by having the tent vents all sealed up, had to open the one in the back to prevent negative airflow from wind burning my plants. Long Story short, great, going to grow some dank outta this baby
customer_reviews.author: Charles710

customer_reviews.title: Lets light through
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this tent has pinholes of light shining througout. This is unnacceptable for a grow tent as it also lets light in. Its worthless for my grow because of this. Wish i found out in time to return. As itnis, im stuck with it. Dont get stuck.
customer_reviews.author: AndrewTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.text: I am not mechanically inclined, what-so-ever. Even I was able to throw this tent together within 20 minutes and w/o instructions. Idk what your purposes are, but for my purposes, this tent meets my needs perfectly. 5 stars for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hine

customer_reviews.title: Overall Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this grow tent ao much! There are no light leaks and it works as describes. When i ordered it though i thought it would be bigger, but that was my fault. I will be ordering a bigger size soon though. I also noticed the seams are starting to unravel. It isnt causeing light leaks yet but it is starting to come apart. Same with the exhaust and intake ports. The seems are unravelling but im not too worried. Will update if condition gets worse.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Holes + Poles seams used, overall good product and matches size and other descriptions
customer_reviews.text: Overall, could be a fantastic tent. I must have received a defective one as havn’t seen other reviews like this. I really like the size and overall sturdy and seams like it can support a lot of weight. Super easy to assemble and tarp fit perfectly. I received the tarp with a ton of holes and you can even see them without the room being dark. The poles seem as though it was used and have orange stuff over them. Quite displeased but can’t return as I need it. Overall, could be really good product but mine was not. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Denys

customer_reviews.title: great for beginner.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. my first grow tent which i bought for winter tomatoes. So i wasn't sure how things would go but with the grow light and this tent it made my plants sprout in a week. its quality material and is perfect for 3-4 plants. highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: No complaints so far!
customer_reviews.text: Just got the tent today. Everything was in the box. It did have a little bit of a weird smell at first but it disappeared fast. It was super easy to assemble and seems pretty study. I'm good with the size of it as I only plan on having two 5 gallon pots in it at once. I'll come back and update my review once we start growing in it!
customer_reviews.author: Trust the Process

customer_reviews.title: Overall great grow tent
customer_reviews.text: This is my first grow tent so with the price alone I’m satisfied. There are minor leaks of light but they are very minor. Also one of my zippers broke today so I just keep it at the bottom and use the other one. Again I really can’t complain with the price, just being honest with my experience. I’m currently only growing one plant so the tent is very roomy. 😁
customer_reviews.author: steve wood

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I got this for $50 and feel like it was an absolute steal. Super easy to put together and perfect for what I'll need to get me started. I see it's back to $69.99 and still feel like that's a good price for it. I may end up purchasing a second in another few months.
customer_reviews.author: Hamburger

customer_reviews.title: Best for 1 plant if hootch.
customer_reviews.text: This tent is fine and dandy for one plant but didn't work too well until I upped the temperature around it as it wasn't summer yet. That is the important thing to remember especially during germination! Warmth and a good light are essential . . . preferably at least 1000 watts.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Maluchnik

customer_reviews.title: Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the package missing a few of the metal rods, it seems to work fine. However, maybe I’m just unlucky but not all parts were there. It was missing top support, as well as the upper bar for the sides. Had some old pvc I used in its place. Interior lining is of good quality, no light leaks, and came with three tight string air holes for fans and etc.
customer_reviews.author: Keeferkush

customer_reviews.title: I was up set, but now am quite pleased:)
customer_reviews.text: To start, I gave this product a very bad review. I would whole heartedly like to amend my review. This tender is fantastic, the cruze difference i came across can be over looked with ease. Quality material, sound and sturdy, very effective. Simple build for such a quality affordable tent... I'm looking to start other tents and will be buying from them again hands down cant wait!!!!
customer_reviews.author: chris mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: For the price I didn’t expect much. I put it together and the material feels thicker than I thought it would be. I needed this quick so I wasn’t picky. The zippers were my big concern as well as light bleed. I put a 350 watt mars hydro led light in it and had the room pitch black. I didn’t see any light bleed at all. The zippers feel great and I would have no reservations about recommending this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya I Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Not Big Enough For My Needs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 24x24x36 as my first grow tent. Overall I thought the quality was nice and the assembly was easy and straightforward. Ultimately I returned the tent as I did not anticipate my grow space needs and had to get a bigger tent. Returning this product was not a reflection of the quality rather my grow needs increased.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great little tent
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for clones or micro grows of any fruits, vegetable or herbs and spices. No window but works really well. Even with LEDs tent can get hot so make sure your prepared to cool and vent.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Chick

customer_reviews.title: Solid tent at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I unpackaged this tent and was immediately struck by the quality of the construction - the supports are sturdy and the cloth is thick and generally well manufactured. All of the vents have drawstrings or flaps to keep out excess light which is a big plus. The frame was easy to assemble and more than capable of supporting lights/ventilation. The only reason I'm not giving this tent 5 stars is that the tent came missing a zipper pull. On the bright side, the seller was very helpful in fixing the issue promptly. Overall recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Panella

customer_reviews.title: It is about perfect for up to Two (2) plants side-by-side
customer_reviews.text: It is about perfect for up to Two (2) plants side-by-side. Just have to make sure you're not growing anything too tall. If it had some interior hangers for lights, it would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I know I was buying one of the least expensive tents so I was not expecting much but boy was I surprised. Great quality and easy assembly. I have zipped and unzipped that things 1000 times already and no snags or even hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made and sturdy. The only thing I don't like about it ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had the tent for a few weeks now. Seems well made and sturdy. The only thing I don't like about it is that the vent hole for a fan is on the roof rather than the wall so a fan needs to be suspended vertically for exhausting which (for my setup) is much more difficult than having it suspended horizontally. There is a hole on the wall at the top but it's only 3" in diameter so too small for almost all fans.
customer_reviews.author: K jogn

customer_reviews.title: Used for Bonsai. Worked exactly as hoped.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Deceptively large. Keeps plenty of heat. I was able to hang a medium sized Bestva grow light to the cross braces across the top with no issue. Plenty of places to get air circulating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Zipper
customer_reviews.text: This isn't the best tent but it is good for someone that doesn't expect years of use. I have only had it a month and it feels like the zipper will break if I open it 50 times.
customer_reviews.author: djchitown

customer_reviews.title: LED Grow Light Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Minimal packaging, but not much directions are needed. If you know enough to buy one, you likely are familiar enough to just operate it. After a couple weeks, the unit is working as expected for a 2ft x 2ft x 48inch grow tent. Runs cool, at around 80 degrees F. Have to see how it runs in the long-term.
customer_reviews.author: graficgod

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a resin printer
customer_reviews.text: Works great to house my resin printer and vent the fumes
customer_reviews.author: ItsATrap

customer_reviews.title: Internal sleeve cord missing
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this tent but was disappointed to find the internal sleeve in the upper vent hole was missing the closure cord. Of course I did not discover this until I had it totally put together. Plants in place and was using the top vent for the light cord when I found the problem. Too bad because other than the cord missing it appears to be overall a nice little tent. I will re-evaluate my rating once I hear from customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Joann B.

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't what I was needing.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this tent but if you are looking for a small tent it isn't that bad. Detentions were off and the zippers kept sticking. But the price was right LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Every bit what I wanted and more. Very pleasantly surprised. Many of the features were superfluous for me, as I used it as an edible mushroom fruiting tent, but it's a great item for the price, and when I expand I will purchase one of their larger tents.
customer_reviews.author: Harley Nolan

customer_reviews.title: My Plants are Very Happy!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect size and it was a breeze to set up. Has lots of access points for lights and ventilation. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Coachmom65

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Wish it were more sturdy overall can grow 2 maybe 3 plants Update the text zippers for the doors are not working and get stuck I can’t seem to contact this company.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Need update instructions or Mark the number two poles
customer_reviews.text: Was searching for all of the number 2 poles, like it shows in the instructions but finally noticed they sent more number 1 poles.. it works but the drawing should be updated
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Rhoden

customer_reviews.title: Good size for indoor grow!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my package today. I will be following up with the quality. So far everything is good. 10 minutes install. The only downfall is there’s no instructions for the extra attachments so I have to rig it myself. I highly recommend this grow tent for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: John Naluz

customer_reviews.title: Great seedlings tent
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. The instructions are easy to follow an I have my seeds ready inside growing already. Set up the tent by myself in less than a half hour. Has nice air an portal's for electric wiring. Thanks so much
customer_reviews.author: Connie Cool

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was in fact less the 5 minutes. Awesome little tent.
customer_reviews.text: East to assemble, great for small spaces. I'm using it for drying flower. Seems to be nice and dark once you close off the vents etc. East to move around. So far it is working as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and comes as advertised
customer_reviews.text: First time grower here and I was looking for a nice way to store my plants without taking up too much space. The item came in a discreet box with a insurrection manual and all pieces included. It was very easy to put together and always very lightweight to transfer around. The covering is very thick and doesn't allow light to leak out. The shipping was very quick and I will not hesitate to purchase again from vendor for future grow!
customer_reviews.author: Jr Cornwall

customer_reviews.title: This was a great deal! The material if very thick and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal! The material if very thick and sturdy. Light does not get out of the tent when closed. For the price I expected the support poles would be plastic, but they are metal and fits together very well. It came with two removable bars to hang your lights, fan, or whatever you need. My plant is already doing well combined with my 600w Growstar led and Foxfarm Ocean Forest Soil. The product is the same size as advertised. My only regret is that I should have got the next size up. But that is my fault, not theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Buckner

customer_reviews.title: Tough Sturdy packaged perfectly easy to assemble and fast response!
customer_reviews.text: Product came perfectly packaged. Easy to assemble, sturdy and tough material. Very happy with my purchase after my first grow maybe ill upgrade in sie and i will purchase through the same seller. Very happy and extremely satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.author: InfoTech

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tent.
customer_reviews.text: this Tent was perfect and i had a small issue but the customer service was outstanding and helped work through it. i will never buy a tent from anyone else. great product and great people.
customer_reviews.author: James L.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Had to cut 3" from the height. This was very easy to do with a tubing cutter. Weeds are growing great. Floured way early.
customer_reviews.author: rosemary pfender

customer_reviews.title: Not happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with all pieces tried to return but due to COVID-19 I miss the 30 day period to return now stuck with a product I can't use not a happy customer
customer_reviews.author: nastassia

customer_reviews.title: Missing Removable Plastic Tray
customer_reviews.text: The removable plastic tray was not in the package. When assembling, the metal frame pieces were mislabeled. Was still able to assemble easily though, it’s a tent. Follow the pictures. Also not a fan of the plastic corners.
customer_reviews.author: Mako

customer_reviews.title: ImporTENT asset
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this tent. I kept saying I was going to get one and the day came when I had enough extra money to actually purchase it. It definitely does it job.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Good tent
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for being the one of the cheapest tents you can buy on here. It’s nice and compact. Good for beginners or microgrowers
customer_reviews.author: dusty jenkins

customer_reviews.title: It’ll do the job but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it’s an affordable tent with little light pollution. However, one corner support cracked upon assembly and the door must be entirely unzipped to gain access which means I have to remove the tent from my closet in order to get in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Add It To Your Cart NOW
customer_reviews.text: I bought the used version of this and it was just like brand new ! I appreciated how easy it was to assemble by myself. The only issue I had with this product was that it didn’t come with lighting hangers but Cathy did an amazing job at providing customer service and helping me out with that issue. 100% would purchase from them again !
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: my plants love it
customer_reviews.text: works as advertized nice little unit has door flap that zips open and closed with no problem and it seems to be the perfect little portable greenhouse I was hoping for
customer_reviews.author: Craig B. Suide

customer_reviews.title: Great sz!!! Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Love this greenhouse it fits perfectly in a corner and doesn’t take up too much space! I order a led light that I hung inside and the combination is working great for my plants
customer_reviews.author: Kahlilah

customer_reviews.title: Not the best zippers.
customer_reviews.text: The zipper broke off after about 6 weeks of use. Zippers are important when you have to unzip the tent every day.
customer_reviews.author: Nick de Vries

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This product is good for what we need it for. There is only one thing that we did not like is that the zipper broke like 3 weeks after we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Aggie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tent
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Put together in 15 minutes. Absolutely no light leaks. Multiple ports for fans, lights etc. Maintains heat. Easy access zippers. Thick and durable
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy to Assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy and tent seem to be made of durable materials. Make sure you really consider the height of the tent. I got the 48" and could have really used something taller. Be sure to consider any lighting you maybe using. Great for short plants.
customer_reviews.author: f1y_r1c3

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it...
customer_reviews.text: I would ABSOLUTELY recommend this product to anyone who is in the market for a good grow tent. Small enough for a corner in your room and super strong for almost any equipment needed to fulfill your grow room needs. Keep up the good work!!
customer_reviews.author: Quvon Coston-Harris

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered and all the pieces where in the box an easy to install
customer_reviews.author: KIA

customer_reviews.title: I love it and so do my plants.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. My plants do, too. What a great product. I will probably get a larger one eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Cleversea

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works perfectly. Doesn't really take up too much room.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great tent. No Leaks. Just finished my first grow successfully in it.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, but unlcear instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Very good tent for growing indoor plants. The instructions were unclear however and I'm left with some parts that I don't know what to do with. This doesn't seem to have a negative effect since it's still in place and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and use
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly as advertised. Easy to set and use. Could have used some time off points on the inside
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality great price
customer_reviews.text: Works great and has great placement for the ports, very sturdy and durable materials. I was able to fit 2 plants on a budget grow with 150w HPS light bought on amazon as well
customer_reviews.author: isaac Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Nice grow tent
customer_reviews.text: I had a small issue with it , but Doris at customer service handled it. Nice grow tent and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Good tent 👍
customer_reviews.text: It's super easy to assemble and it feels of good quality.It worked great for my need and will work good for anyone else as far as I'm concerned
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Great tent but seems to attract mites. A struggle I’ve retired the tent because of but am still hanging onto for the future.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Hi
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I just wish it was a complete kit instead of just the tent
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Yates

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: In my second month and I am having no issues with it at all. Contains light perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product the material could be a thicker material and the bars for the top part could be better but love it . Grew cannabis in it turned out nice. I should of got a bigger size too
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Nichole Failach

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I can’t find anything to complain about with this tent except I should have got a bigger one lol. Everything is of good quality I think I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Bodiker

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Pleased! Easy to assemble. Good material. Nice heavy duty zipper!
customer_reviews.author: riptrk

customer_reviews.title: Good tent
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this tent for a while now, and really enjoy it. There is good stuff made cheap, and cheap stuff made good; and this tent seems to fall into the later. I’ve bought more premium tents in the past and they have had light leaks and didn’t feel as well made as this one!
customer_reviews.author: evanblackmaneb

customer_reviews.title: A gift, he likes it.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to a friend who grows muscadine for wine, he likes it so far. He said it is easy to put up, and is heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Garry

customer_reviews.title: It's good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly this... it's good but not great. Does its job well
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome
customer_reviews.text: Just an awesome product for the price my babies are doing perfect in this thing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for your money
customer_reviews.text: Great for about 2 plants but you could fit 3 but its pushing it. Great quality for the price and a small set up .
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: missing parts
customer_reviews.text: received item and the hanging bars for the top portion of the tent are missing, the bars were not included in order received.
customer_reviews.author: jessica gomero

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was super easy to put it together!! It’s light proof. I’ll update it about the smell once my harvest is done. The zippers are heavy duty and the Mylar is thicker than other tents I’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Payne

customer_reviews.title: Good constriction
customer_reviews.text: Great for growing and bring plant in for the cold and those rainy days
customer_reviews.author: Erica B

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the prince.
customer_reviews.text: In the middle of growing a second plant. Everything about this tent is as described and working fine. My only complaint is the bottom protective piece has already ripped. You have to be really careful.
customer_reviews.author: 3POnR2

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This tent is great and works well. Keeps smell from escaping
customer_reviews.author: Philip M.

customer_reviews.title: Good for small grows
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 bigger tents baby meets up to big boy standards
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: good for lil closet op.
customer_reviews.text: Easy assemble. The poles are metal. I would give it a five star for quality except the plastic corners. 1 cracked when i was putting it up. It's standing. Let's see how it holds when I put my light and vent up.
customer_reviews.author: Frank y Chen

customer_reviews.title: Single set up
customer_reviews.text: Has a good seal on it. Good material good build. Perfect single 5 gallon pot fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: For smaller plants
customer_reviews.text: For the most part easy to assemble. Getting the outter tarp on bit of a challenge. But good so far
customer_reviews.author: Michael Geishert

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tent
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the plastic corners but it's a sturdy little tent for the price. Great little clone or early veg tent.
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice starter, but I wish I would have gotten a taller one.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Tent is a must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Tent is awesome came two days later would certainly recommend and will certainly be ordering another in a bigger size Thank you 💯💯💯
customer_reviews.author: BrokeBoy617

customer_reviews.title: Closet sized
customer_reviews.text: About the largest that will fit in an apartment sized closet.
customer_reviews.author: W. Markuly

customer_reviews.title: Holds in lights very well and convenient to put in small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to set up! Just the perfect size for a small growing station and I set it up in a closet underneath my stairs so it’s kinda hidden. It also keeps the light in the tent very well. One thing I didn’t like was the set up to hang lights etc. Limited options for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great, affordable, sturdy tent
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and sturdy enough to hold everything I need. Completely light proof, although I received mine with a small 1/4 inch hole on one of the top right edges. A very small issue, in an otherwise perfect grow tent.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I got this light and it stopped working a day later, the fans on the inside still work the light just doesn't. I gave it 4 stars because it was perfect before it stopped working. but now its kind of useless and its been hard to try and get a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Jordan smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The product was perfect came on time and was very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Telav

product_meta.title: TopoLite 24"x24"x48" 32"x32"x63" 36"x36"x72" 48"x24"x72" 48"x48"x80" 96"x48"x80" 96"x96"x80" 120"x120"x80" Indoor Grow Tent Hydroponic Growing Dark Room w/Plastic Corner (24"x24"x48")
product_meta.description:
Description:
Our grow tent has all stable construction, 600D oxford cloth outside and 96% highly reflective diamond Mylar inside, with exterior zippers design ensure safety use and easy to set up. And it also has multiple vents to accommodate fans and filter. Great for you to grow exotic fruits, herbs, vegetables or seasonal fruits out of season. We promise to provide you with the highest-quality hydroponics equipment and services at our factory-direct prices.

 Features:
Inside: 96% highly reflective diamond Mylar(enhance the reflective effect) 
Large heavy duty Zippers 
Outside: heavy duty 600D lightproof oxford cloth
Frame: diameter 16MM white paint coated metal rods 
Connector Material: 16MM (diameter) sturdy plastic connectors
Rectangle vents with mesh for better ventilation
Multiple vents for fan and filter output
Quick tool-free installation 

 Package includes: 
1x 96% 600D reflective Growing Tent Cover
1 set 16MM frame of rods and connectors
1x Removable Floor Tray 
2x Nylon Belts can be used for Filter Straps
1x Assembly Instruction
feature_bullets: 24"x24"x48" Hydroponic Indoor Grow Tent w/ Plastic Corner w/ DISCREET SHIPPING
Vents: Rectangle vents with mesh for better ventilation and multiple vents for fan and filter output
Reflective: 96% highly reflective diamond mylar (enhance the reflective effect)
Durable: Heavy duty 600D lightproof oxford cloth and diameter 16MM white paint coated metal rods and Large heavy duty Zippers
